text: Yakhana tini aropa karena tomadera upara tandracchanna ta nijera paksa theke tomadera prasantira jan'ya ebam tomadera upara akasa theke pani abatarana karena, yate tomadigake pabitra kare dena ebam yate tomadera theke apasarita kare dena sayatanera apabitrata. Ara yate kare suraksita kare dite parena tomadera antarasamuhake ebam tate yena sudrrha kare dite parena tomadera pa gulo.
